Sure, I will change all the text to be about dinosaurs.
Change all of the text to be about dinosaurs

In the conversation, the user and the AI assistant discussed multiple requests to customize the application. The user initially asked the AI to change all text to be about dinosaurs instead of headphones. Following this, the user requested the addition of a form to contact Santa, and the AI confirmed it would be implemented. The AI then prompted the user with questions about the specific fields and design of the form. 

Subsequently, the user asked for a "Shoryouken" button to be added, to which the AI acknowledged and confirmed its addition. The conversation continued with the user providing further details on the feature, including placement and function, and the AI confirmed it would implement the requested 'Shoryouken' functionality. 

Later, the user requested to change an image to a dinosaur, and the AI confirmed it would update the image accordingly while also gathering options regarding placement and style from the user. Additional features such as animated themes and sound effects related to dinosaurs were discussed, with the AI acknowledging each request. Finally, the AI asked for clarification on the project at hand to better understand and execute the user's wishes.
